title: Army's Heaven
descriptions: Army's Heaven is a Single Player/Multiplayer FPS game that utilizes PUN2 (Photon Unity Package) for its multiplayer backend. Originally conceived as a multiplayer project, the game currently features a deathmatch mode and offers a selection of two distinct maps.

I am currently focusing on the single player mode that will provide a campaign of a few hours, and introduce all the mechanics that I will transfer back in the multiplayer mode (such as the new character controller, guns, and shooting mechanics).
Here are a few things I am working on:
&#x2022 Replacing the current hand rig with new ones from an asset pack (introducing new guns, new animations, etc..)
&#x2022 Implementing shooting system used in the multiplayer on the new character controller.
&#x2022 Fix any potential issues with the zombies/npc AI that will (for sure) arise at the end of the refactor.
&#x2022 Implementing an event system similar to the used in 'Deck Planner'.
